objects.text:
• CBD-infused premium products
• Multiple natural formulations
• Lab-tested for quality & purity
• Easy-to-use applicators

product_details.name: Blue Ridge Hemp Co. Premium CBD Collection - Natural Wellness Solutions
product_details.description:
• CBD-infused products from trusted Blue Ridge Hemp Co.
• Multiple formulations available in convenient packaging
• 200mg CBD content in 2oz jar for optimal potency
• All-natural hemp-derived ingredients
• Various product formats including topicals and oils
• Lab-tested for quality and purity
• Easy-to-use applicators for precise dosing
• Professionally packaged with clear labeling
• Made in USA from premium hemp extracts
• Perfect for wellness and self-care routines

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a wellness-themed layout designed to promote a special offer. The top section includes a bold headline (`heading`) and a supporting subheadline (`tagline`) in large, prominent fonts to grab attention. Below that, a concise bulleted list (`description`) highlights product benefits. To the right, an image of three product bottles (`product_image`) visually reinforces the product offering. The banner is split into two main color blocks — a light top half and a deep green bottom half — creating contrast. The lower section includes an offer heading (`subheading`), price display (`price`), and a clear call-to-action (`cta`) over a colored button background (`cta_background`).

**Color Palette:**
- **Mint Green**: #F0F7EF
- **Deep Forest Green**: #2D6A4F
- **Medium Mint**: #95D5B2
- **Accent Green**: #52B788
- **Soft Green**: #B7E4C7
- **White**: #FFFFFF
- **Dark Text Green**: #1B4332
product_color: This product image features three CBD roll-on bottles in vibrant earthy tones that balance warmth and calm energy. The primary colors used are burnt orange (#C14428), forest green (#3D6A63), and mustard yellow (#D9A441), which create a natural, organic feel ideal for wellness branding. Black caps (#1A1A1A) and white text (#FFFFFF) add contrast and clarity. Each bottle subtly blends the label shade with the dark cap, allowing the branding to stand out without overwhelming. For the advertisement banner, a clean neutral background like light beige (#F5F5DC) can help these colors pop while maintaining a grounded and serene aesthetic.
